Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) technology still suffers from problems like high costs and insufficient lifetime, partly caused by the traditional serial-connected stack design.
Titulo: New SOFC-Stack Design with Parallel-Connected Cells - Basic Concept and Joining Aspects

Sentencas: To overcome some of these issues a new design with parallel-connected cells is proposed.
Titulo: New SOFC-Stack Design with Parallel-Connected Cells - Basic Concept and Joining Aspects

Sentencas: The concept is based on a cartridge designed repeating unit consisting of two cells, electrically connected in parallel.
Titulo: New SOFC-Stack Design with Parallel-Connected Cells - Basic Concept and Joining Aspects

Sentencas: Stack modules with 50 to 60W can be built up by stacking and interconnect these basic units, likewise in a parallel mode.
Titulo: New SOFC-Stack Design with Parallel-Connected Cells - Basic Concept and Joining Aspects

Sentencas: Finally, several stack modules can be connected in serial configuration to supply reasonable terminal voltage and power.
Titulo: New SOFC-Stack Design with Parallel-Connected Cells - Basic Concept and Joining Aspects

Sentencas: Different design options for the twin cell unit were evaluated by flow field simulations and with respect to their producibility.
Titulo: New SOFC-Stack Design with Parallel-Connected Cells - Basic Concept and Joining Aspects

Sentencas: Both, metallic and ceramic concepts for the cell frames are considered.
Titulo: New SOFC-Stack Design with Parallel-Connected Cells - Basic Concept and Joining Aspects

Sentencas: Glass seals are completely avoided to improve durability.
Titulo: New SOFC-Stack Design with Parallel-Connected Cells - Basic Concept and Joining Aspects

Sentencas: Reactive air brazing (RAB) is used for mounting the cells in the frames.
Titulo: New SOFC-Stack Design with Parallel-Connected Cells - Basic Concept and Joining Aspects

Sentencas: The concept with metallic cell frames additionally uses pulsed laser welding to seal the gas compartments.
Titulo: New SOFC-Stack Design with Parallel-Connected Cells - Basic Concept and Joining Aspects

Sentencas: Preliminary tests on welding and brazing show the general feasibility of these joining technologies and disclose a way to mass production of twin cells as basic repeating units.
Titulo: New SOFC-Stack Design with Parallel-Connected Cells - Basic Concept and Joining Aspects

Sentencas: Flow field simulations assist the dimensioning to assure homogeneous distribution of reactants.
Titulo: New SOFC-Stack Design with Parallel-Connected Cells - Basic Concept and Joining Aspects
